product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Nimbus Air Sleeping Pad - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Nimbus Air Sleeping Pad is compact when stowed. Once inflated, all you have is the weight of the fabric since it doesn't contain any foam. Sleeping pad weighs only 1 lb. 2 oz. Inflation takes just a couple of minutes and is done via the built-in pump near the head of the pad. Horizontal tube design makes for a comfortable sleeping area. When it's time to store the pad in your pack, it compacts very small so you're not taking up a lot of room. The ALPS Mountaineering Nimbus Air Sleeping Pad features brass valves for long-term durability, and it comes with a stuff sack and repair kit. Special buy.
short_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Nimbus Air Sleeping Pad is compact when stowed. Once inflated, all you have is the weight of the fabric since it doesn't contain any foam.
